sentences.ocr_sentence: Recently, there are many music and K-pop singer coming out.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Also, many people including youth are enjoying and affected by it.

sentences.ocr_sentence: As the world keeps affected by K-pop, some people are concerned about K-pop music"s bad influence because it can have the bad effect.

sentences.ocr_sentence: But, for my opinion, I strongly believe that K-pop has more positive effect than harm on the youth.
sentences.corrected_sentence: But in my opinion, I strongly believe that K-pop has a more positive impact than harm on youth.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Firstly, it can inspire confidence and hope.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Firstly, it can inspire confidence and hope.

sentences.ocr_sentence: In my life, I"m having hard time due to the homework and school test.

sentences.ocr_sentence: But, I sometimes get rested by hearing K-pop music and getting hope by it.
sentences.corrected_sentence: But I sometimes find comfort in listening to K-pop music and feeling hopeful because of it.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Also, during COVID-19 pandemic, I was having hard time by its regulation.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Also, during the COVID-19 pandemic, I struggled with the restrictions.

sentences.ocr_sentence: But when BTS"s song named "Permission to Dance", I can feel the hope to end the pandemic.
sentences.corrected_sentence: But when I heard BTS"s song "Permission to Dance," I felt hopeful about the end of the pandemic.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Secondly, it can make the whole culture more interest to youths.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Secondly, it can make the whole culture more interesting to young people.

sentences.ocr_sentence: In my school, how many girl classmates gather and hang out to talk about their favorite K-pop singer or songs.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Also, they collect their money or go to other place merchandise product of singer.
sentences.corrected_sentence: They also save up their money to buy merchandise from their favorite artists.

sentences.ocr_sentence: This can trigger youths to make more friends and making them to be more socialized, which is important to later on the work.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Third and lastly, it can make Korean youth to think again about their traditional culture and proud of.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Lastly, it can make Korean youth rethink their traditional culture and feel proud of it.
